4.text:
element.innerBox = boxFromPoint(
    element.x,
    element.y,
    element.w,
    element.h
)

31.text:
element.subboxes.push(
    boxForHorizontalLine(
        element.x,
        bottomY,
        element.x + element.loX,
        margin
    )
)

32.text:
element.subboxes.push(
    boxForHorizontalLine(
        element.x + element.hiX,
        topY,
        element.x,
        margin
    )
)

28.text:
element.subboxes.push(
    boxForVerticalLine(
        element.x,
        element.y,
        bottomY,
        margin
    )
)

18.text:
topX = element.x + element.hiX
bottomX = element.x + element.loX

33.text:
element.subboxes.push(
    boxForHorizontalLine(
        element.x + element.loX,
        bottomY,
        element.x,
        margin
    )
)

24.text:
element.box = createBoxWithMargin(
    left,
    topY,
    width,
    height,
    margin
)

30.text:
element.subboxes.push(
    boxForHorizontalLine(
        element.x,
        topY,
        element.x + element.hiX,
        margin
    )
)

23.text:
width = right - left
height = bottomY - topY

17.text:
topY = element.y + element.hiY
bottomY = element.y + element.loY

27.text:
element.subboxes.push(
    boxForVerticalLine(
        element.x,
        topY,
        element.y,
        margin
    )
)

20.text:
left = Math.min(
    topX,
    Math.min(
        bottomX,
        element.innerBox.left
    )
)
